title: "oh hey look the ap xin is now a villian"
body:
2-3 ppl engaged him (I was the garen)

imediatley heals himself straight up to full health while my passive proc and I proceed to ult to deal over 1k true damage but it didnt matter because he can imediatley heal himself up while he has knock up with insane ap scale on sustain

whats even more retarded is how hes able to sustain all the outer turrets and the inner turrets in base while tanking everything while sustaining not even need a minion wave to tank the turret shot for him. 


Thank you riot for making hextech gunblade and guisnoos broken, not only jax is broken but apparently ap xin.. lmfao....

Edit: and he didnt even build devourer too LOL

replies.body: Ban {{champion:5}} until further notice, He is extremely broken when he buys {{item:3124}} .
None of those will stop Xin from 1v1'ing your nexus turrets if you're not there to hit him.
Oh I'm sorry. I thought he said "2-3 ppl engaged him (I was the garen)" not "1v1'ing your nexus turrets if you're not there to hit him."

"whats even more retarded is how hes able to sustain all the outer turrets and the inner turrets in base while tanking everything while sustaining not even need a minion wave to tank the turret shot for him"

That's from his post. :3

does gunblade heal you for damage you do to towers?

i hope not

also does xin . omg. does xin Q and W also heal him for damage to towers (q doing damage and healing. and w healing)... my god..
Xin Q does do bonus damage and reduces cooldown when attacking towers and yes every 3rd hit, even on towers, will heal him.
I used to play xin zhao ap before season 6 and it was already op if you started with full as#cd runes... :D
